name: A Blob's Life
description:
Awake as a strange creature in a stranger ecosystem.  Can you figure out enough to survive, or even thrive, before space runs out?

My entry for Ludum Dare 42.

Politeness Update changes:

  • Same exact gameplay as compo submission
  • BugFix: Winning sends you to the "You Win" screen correctly
  • Arrow keys supported in addition to WASD
  • Added ability to hit R to quick-retry
